charges.charge_disposition: Defendant Plead Guilty to Count I of The Indictment in Case 8:07cr416 And Defendant Pleaded Guilty to Counts I And II of The Indictment in Case 8:08cr200 And is Committed to The Custody of The Bureau of Prisons For A Term of 24 Months on Count I in Case 8:07cr416 And 6 Months on Count I in Case 8:08cr200 Said Terms to be Served Consecutively; 3 Years Supervised Release With Special Conditions on Count I in Case 8:07cr416 And 3 Years Supervised Release With Special Conditions on Count I in Case 8:08cr200 Said Terms to Run Concurrently; $100 Special Assessment For Case 8:07cr416 And $100 Special Assessment For Case 8:08cr200. Final Order of Forfeiture on Count Ii(Case 8:08cr200) Forthcoming.
